text: My baby has been there since 2 months old. The teachers are awesome and very loving. Everyday he loved to go to school. Special thanks to Ms Rachel, teacher Doris, teacher VJ and teacher Das..he loves school just because of you guys. My son is only 2.5 years old but he speaks so well. Kudos to all the teachers

My son has been here since he was 3 months old, and now he is 1yo. The teachers are kind, friendly, and care for the children. I can tell my son feels comfortable and loved, and he loves going to school every day. We are so thankful for the wonderful care he receives here!

My boy started Infant Care at York Infant and Early Years at 2 months. He really enjoyed his time there and loves the activities the teachers planned out! Would like to specifically thank Ms Rachel and Ms Das, for taking care of Kaizen from his 1st day up till his last (end of March). Will miss the teachers here!

York Infant care has been an amazing place for my child‚Äôs growth definitely appreciate all the teachers that have taken care of my son. Teachers were very patient and loving. My son definitely loved and enjoyed his time!

My twins has joined in since they are 3months old. Now they are 8months old they have been a great teacher to them. Growing up very well with York infant care ..I'm happy with the daily updates from teachers üòÅ they really did a great job. Appreciate it so much .
